column1: pitched on a length, defended
once more, no hint of swing just yet
this was fuller, and was there a hint of swing. Came back into the batsman, driven confidently to mid-on
a little wider on this occasion, and Rahul doesn't bother with it
slightly wide once more, and Rahul just looks like he wants to settle in for now. Lets it be.
three in a row, and that's a maiden. Left alone. Good start for Pakistan.
fuller length straightaway to Rohit, to drives to mid-off
slightly wider, and seamed back in. Driven back to the bowler

oooh, that was a moral victory for Hasan, but India are off the mark! Came back in and tucked Rohit up. The batsmen gets an inside edge on one that nipped back in, and there was no preventing it running through to the boundary.
blocked
straighter, and flicked away through the onside. In the air slightly, but well clear of any fielder and the two come back
a bit too straight, and quick as a flash, Rohit works it away to square leg. The infielder has a chase, and just about prevents it going to the rope. Hasan's first over brings nine.
Rohit looked to leave, but didn't get his bat out of the way quickly enough. Hits the bat andgoes through to Sarfaraz on the bounce
brilliant bowling. Rohit looked like he was coming forward and Amir knocked him back with a sharp bouncer. The footwork wasn't there, and the lazy pull barely missed the top edge
the angle takes this one away. Swing doesn't seem to exist for now, and Rohit leaves it alone. Amir has been warned, officially, for stepping onto the pitch.
wider, and Rahul decided letting it go is for the best once more
Rahul gets off the mark off his eighth ball
dragged down legside, and Rohit tucks it away to fine leg
wicket-to-wicket, and Rohit blocks
lovely straight drive. Rohit is getting himself in very nicely. Perhaps a touch too full from Hasan, and this time Rohit's drive to mid-off just about evades a diving Wahab Riaz
wider and shorter, was there to be cut away. Exactly what Rohit tried, but misses out
better ball, on an off-stump line. Defended deftly
hint of tail back in. Gets a thick inside edge onto his pad. Better over from Hasan, but still cost five runs.
angled away from the right-hander. Inswing not there, but it does play on the batsman's mind, so remains a goo option
bouncer, and Rahul pulls aggressively at it. Doesn't nearly get it off the middle, but with the fielding restrictions, there was no one at midwicket, where it trickled away for four
good comeback. Back to the stock length delivery that threatens to move in. Rahul cuts, but gets the inside edge and bounces over the stumps
fuller, slower delivery, and Rahul lets it go through to Sarfaraz
shorter, and defended to the offside
slower ball, a bit of an offcutter, and it beats the batsman's defensive block. Good over from the bowler, but the warnings will play on his mind
off-stump line, Rohit defends
short of a length, and turned around to the onside for one. Pakistan's quest for early wickets hasn't materialised yet
short again, and Rahul doesn't shy away from the pull. Wasn't completely in control,but kept it along the ground
short and wide, crunched away by Rohit, Poor delivery, but it was in the air at point so long Imam fancied he was in with a shot. He puts in a valiant drive, but it's just wide of him.
on target, and quicker (87mph). Rohit lets it go

oh, what a shot! Rohit is on the march now! Short of a length and the batsman takes a step back and lofts it over cow corner. It's higher than it is wider, but it was timed so sweetly it just about carries over the fence. Another expensive over from Hasan
wider, left alone
better ball, beats the bat and through to the keeper
slower ball that Rahul tucks away to third man. Right, Amir against Rohit now. Will Rohit continue to attack?
short and straight. Rohit blocks and runs
close, that. It took Rahul's inside edge and went through to fine leg, which is standing up now
gets some movement after it bounces. Moves away from the keeper, allowing a bye that means Rahul will keep the strike against Hasan. Which might relieve the bowler
tucks it away to square leg
on a length and quick. Rohit pulls on one leg to the onside
good delivery, rising from a length. Defended back to the bowler
played right under his nose, guided to third man
full and straight, blocked resolutely. Goos over from Wahab to begin. One ball to go

ahhh, and that was a poor delivery! Almost a chance for fine leg, though. Short and on the body. Helped away by the batsman, and only just evades the leap from the man and fine leg before it speeds away to the boundary. India are beginning to motor now
round the wicket and starts off with a wide down legside
skids on, defended
tucked away to the leg side
a bit straight from Imad again, and Rohit helps it to square leg
better, held its line, and Rahul drives back to the bowler
again, a little shorter. Rahul blocks once more
dragged own once more. Four singles from Imad's first

what has Pakistan done?!! That was a clear as day run out opportunity. Rohit came through for two when it never was on, and the outfielder throws to the wrong end. Sarfaraz is fuming. Pakistan have missed a massive chance here
blocked
turned away to the onside as Rohit gets off strike
came back in. First hint of swing for Wahab. Gets the outside edge and trickles through to third man
a little bit of running uncertainty again. Rahul took off for the second, but Rohit had no intentions of getting out of his crease on that occasion
bit of width and sliced away to the third man boundary. That missed opportunity this over is already looking costly. And for the next ten overs, here's Shashank.
cheeky from KL! This one drifts down leg and Rahul brings out a fine paddle to beat short fine. Got on top of the bounce nicely, risk-free
steps out and chips this over the infield. Imam had to run in a long way from deep square. Enough time to get back for the third
tucks this to short fine as they scamper a quick single. Went straight to Wahab. 'In Lala land' says Wasim Akram on air.
dips on Rahul, square turn as well to hit him on the right pad

direct hit from point at striker's and and he was gone! Hesitation again between these two. Gentle dab into the off side, he wanted a single, Rohit responded late and wasn't even in the frame. Shadab did superbly well to pick up the ball one-hand but got the direction of the throw wrong. He was completely off balance.
right behind the line as he blocks.
welcomed with a crashing cut shot! This is a long hop, spinning away and Rahul cashes in on the freebie.
too short again, slapped to sweeper cover

pulled away! Down to wide long-on where Hasan Ali stops it as he runs around. Rohit picked the short ball, went with the pull but didn't time it off the middle. He's very unhappy with himself but no damage done
full toss and he's sent this into Manchester's CBD! This is very poor from Shadab, waist-high outside off, giving Rohit the free swing and he puts it away effortlessly for a 91-metre hit

crashed to the square boundary on the off side as Rohit raises a 34-ball fifty! Waited for the turn, got well forward and opened the bat face slightly to drive this to the vacant point region. Magnificent
gets well forward and keeps out this full delivery
gets well forward, covers the line and dabs with soft hands
sharp turn again, pokes at this and is beaten. Excellent from Imad, Pakistan will need more of this
punches this into the gap, wide of point as they jog the single
eases this with the spin to extra cover
nicely tossed up, not much turn as he lands this on middle, driven back to the bowler
squeezes the drive to backward point, hint of turn for Imad that time.
turns this back past the bowler to long-on
nice length, draws Rohit forward as he pats it into the off side, again some confusion with the running but no damage done.
driven into the gap, down to sweeper cover
shortens his length, pushed through quicker, Rahul takes a step across and defends back
full toss that he drives to long-off, didn't hit it off the middle though
gets well forward and smothers this tossed up delivery. Tight over that, good comeback.
eased down to long-on
driven with the spin to sweeper cover
deflects it gently to short third man, they scamper a quick single
gets to the pitch of the ball and laces this to the fielder running in from point
eased down to long-off, sensible from Rohit
pushed through quicker on a length outside off, punched to cover
short, wide an crashed wide of the diving point fielder. Rohit is in cruise control. Played that very, very late.
gets well forward and stabs this away
first real bad shot from Rohit, attempts a slog sweep from outside off but plays too early and is beaten
dabs this with the turn to short third man
wrists this tossed up delivery from outside off to wide long-on
makes room and punches this to sweeper cover, too short to have any impact.
eases this with the spin to long-off
once again, leans forward and plays this back past the bowler as they jog the single
taps it with soft hands into the gap at cover
works this incoming delivery down to long-on, good wrist work
attempts to sweep, but is beaten as it was drifting down leg
makes room and punches this shortish delivery to cover
punches this past the bowler to long-on
sharp turn off a length outside off, left alone
gets well forward and plays it late as it spins away
eased into the gap between cover and point to raise India's 100
eased with the spin to long-off, Sarfaraz is disappointed with the short cover fielder, wanted him to hare across to his right. Heard a lot of 'yaaaaars'
stretches forward and defends
gets well forward and defends again, this one dipped a hint on Rahul, had the line well covered.
shortish on middle, punched to deep cover
skids through and straightens, Rahul is squared up but manages to tap it into the off side
lunges forward and drives to backward point
defended back to the bowler, four straight dots. As Ravi would say, something's got to give?
happy to play out the bowler, gets well forward and smothers this full delivery
driven into the gap, down to sweeper cover. Excellent over from Imad
dabs it gently with the spin into the off side for an easy single
drifts into middle, Rohit gets well forward and defends back
looked to sweep, saw this drifting away, yorker length and he just about managed to squeeze it away to the off side
eases this towards he man coming in from point for a quick single, should've never been a run there
dabs to point again, looks for a single but Rohit sends him back. The understanding with the running hasn't been the best. Pakistan - look out for a run out
plays the predetermined reverse sweep, hits this full toss straight to point. Rahul would believe he's missed out on a freebie.
driven to long-on
short, cut away to sweeper cover. Just the one, though
thick outside edge to short third man. The pair scamper one. Good running
flatter and fuller. Rahul needed to sort his feet out but still managed to get it away to the deep cover boundary
beats the infielder and goes to long-on for one
fuller and glanced away to deep midwicket. Two more. Seven from the over
block and run from Rahul. Shoaib bowling around the wicket
short delivery, whipped away the onside. India content to rotate the strike for now
bit of turn. Tucked away for another run
awful delivery that, and gets the treatment it deserves. Fifty for KL Rahul with a six! Long hop, and while the batsman didn't quite middle it, it had enough to go clear the midwicket boundary rope
swept, well cut off by fine leg
another easy single. Shoaib worrying India about as much as I would worry Anthony Joshua
Hafeez is greeted with a blast back over his head. Rohit dances to the pitch of the ball and deposits it to the straight boundary
helped to the offside, and another sharp single
Rahul comes down the wicket, but straight to the cover boundary
defended to short midwicket
Wow, this is just magnificent! Rahul steps away to the onside, and caresses it over extra cover. Sails over the boundary. Gorgeous shotmaking
swept, but Shoaib at fine leg is alert to the danger
guided to third man, rotates the strike
misdirected. Short ball but well down legside
looked to run it off the face of the bat, but instead the ball dropped dead
short, makes Rahul jump. Defended. And the umpire having words with Wahab. Is that an official warning for Wahab?
defended into the covers

gone, Pakistan finally break through. Pitched up to Rahul, and the batsman looked to play on the front foot, and guide it through the covers. Instead, it spooned up to Babar Azam for the most comfortable catch he'll ever take
Poked at it outside the offstump
short and wide, Rohit attempts to cut but misses. And the umpire calls it a wide
straighter, and guided down to third man
Kohli's off the mark. Wasn't quite sure of whether to go front foot or back, but makes a crunching sound off the bat as it flies to the deep cover fielder

seam movement for Hasan, and he's unlucky again. Rohit gets an inside edge even as he tried to work it to third man. It races to the fine leg boundary instead. Almost a carbon copy of what happened in the first Powerplay
caressed to third man this time
short and Kohli pulls it. Doesn't get the timing right, but it's good enough for the pair to come back
well bowled, at the stumps. Kohli defends
full and straight from Wahab, blocked by Rohit. Reckon this could be a crucial passage of play
full again, and Wahab isn't quite bowling to his field. Driven through the covers and the man in the deep cuts it off
shorter, worked away to third man
blocked, and Kohli darts away, urging Rohit to come through for a single
driven to deep extra cover
tails in and hits Kohli's pads. Too high for any real excitement, though
just outside off, left alone

ahhh, and that's Rohit at his sigh-inducing best! There was no risk taken there, and no real effort. Short and wide from Hasan, and Rohit just leans into the cut shot, with the ball flying into the stands
good comeback, straighter, and blocked
driven on the up to point
down leg side, and Rohit glances it to fine leg. Hasan struggling for any rhythm or consistency, and that's hurting the chap bowling at the other end
inside edge, and Kohli hares through for two. The deep fielder wasn't quite alert to Kohli's intentions, and they come back comfortably
full, defended to the onside
short but down legside, and Rohit pulls it off one leg to the fine leg boundary. Will be disappointed to have found the fielder
defended
sharply rising bouncer. The extra yard of pace took Kohli by surprise. Hits him on the gloves
angled away to third man
wided down the offside. Slower ball from Wahab that's horribly misdirected
guided to backward point
Amir starts off a tad too straight, and Rohit turns the strike over. Amir to Kohli now
shorter, and Kohli defends to the offside
Kohli tried to jab at that one. Angled away from the right-hander and very nearly caught the outside dge
driven to short cover
Amir keeping a tight line. He's the only one keeping India reined in at the moment
wider this time, and left alone. Just one of the over
driven to deep cover, and Rohit moves to 96
hangs back and drives to long-on
straighter and quicker, but Rohit gets it away to the offside. Three away now
driven on the full to long-off
guided to deep extra cover. Imam cuts it off, but Rohit reaches 99
and that's his hundred! Comes in 85 balls. Magnificent innings, and could be a match-winning one for India. The crowd erupt for his 24th ODI hundred.
dabs this down to third man
magical! Length ball angling away, Kohli plants forward and punches this on the up between cover and mid-off. Gorgeous!
once again uses the angle to dab this down to the point region
runs this down to third man
once again steers this down to square third man
looks like it'd get big on him but he still managed to pull him in front of square towards deep midwicket
works this down to long-on as they jog the single
driven firmly to long-off
cuts, a misfield at backward point allows a single. This was wide, Rohit had to reach out to play this
gets well forward, just outside the line of off as he defends back
drills this with the spin to wide long-off, the 50-stand is up at a run-a-ball
eased with the spin to deep cover, risk-free stuff.
looks to play a late little cut past the keeper, chops it onto the keeper's pad as it rolls to the off side instead
punched down to long-on
chipped but this lands short of cover, this one gripped on the surface a hint
punched into the gap at cover for an easy single
whips this against the turn to long-on
skids one through on a length, milks this down to long-on again
skips out, the bowler shortens his length, and Rohit smears this to point
chops this cut to short third man, not where he intended
pushed into the gap at extra cover
sharp turn from outside off, Rohit lets it go. Extra bounce too
tracer bullet stuff! Fetches this sweep from outside off, gets on top of the bounce and hits it in front of square. Terrific
works this into the gap between wide long-on and deep midwicket, they stroll for the second.
gets well forward and defends
drilled inside-out, cover fielder got a finger on it, parries it to long-off. The 200 is up for India
drifting into middle and leg, punched into the gap at deep midwicket
lunges forward and eases this back to the bowler

edged, past the keeper, between him and short third man. Races away. A slip would've gobbled that up. But you really can't be that brave to have a man there when the scorecard reads 200 for 1, can you?
eases this back to the bowler
hurries Kohli with a short ball, he's rapped on the glove trying to play a short-arm jab
punched to point, good stop by Shadab. Diving away to his right
slashed up and over point. Too much width, easy pickings. Rohit is seeing them big.
angling into middle and leg on a length, whips this into the gap between deep midwicket and wide long-on
steered down to third man
slips this down leg, tickled down to fine leg
hint of turn off a length, Kohli steers to short third man, was looking to play it wide of point
whips this down to long-on
eased wide of point
driven past the diving cover fielder, down to wide long-off
steps out and drives inside-out to long-off. Didn't quite get to the pitch
wrists this down to long-on
dabs it down to third man

helped along to the deep backward square leg. Short, angling in and it appeared as if Rohit was hustled for pace but he plays the Kapil Dev-like Natraja shot as he swivels and plays it with the angle. Sensational
another short ball angling in, helped along to fine leg. One bounce to the fielder
tucks this off his hip to deep square leg
width and he's crashed this behind point, down to Hasan Ali who comes up with a sliding stop at square third man
full and straight ball angling in, punched down to mid-on
that's a Rohti special! A pull in front of square. Not quite timed off the middle but this trickles away

scooped straight to short fine leg. Didn't have the pace to work with. Hasan shortened his length, rolled his fingers over the seam. Good execution. I think Rohit almost forgot there's a fielder there, he's absolutely livid with himself. End of a top knock, got to say a double century was there on a platter and he's missed out.
skiddy length ball on middle, defended back
cut sway, excellent work in the deep to keep it down to a couple. Fakhar with the sprint and the dive at deep point
whips this into the gap at midwicket, excellent running. Called two the moment he hit this
skiddy short of length delivery, Hardik looking to slash this over point but misses. Lucky not to get an edge.
too short and hammered! Picked the length early, opened up the leg side and muscled this away over the infield
cut away to deep point, a fumble there and they take the second. Imam the man there.
delicate little dab to short third man
beauty! Sharp turn that beats Hardik's push
eased with the spin to long-off
a misfield allows India to come back for two
full delivery, tailing in. Kohli digs it out and drives to long-on
yorker length, flicked to fine leg. Interesting to see if Hasan sticks with this line throughout the over
slower delivery, gets the edge, but the lack of pace means it doesn't carry to Sarfaraz. Pandya got lucky there
full. Pandya helicopters it to fine leg. If that shot begins to fire, watch out Pakistan
full once more, and the pair swap ends
slower ball, jabbed into the onside. The lack of pace on the ball allows the pair to scuttle through for two, and let's face it, Pakistan's fielders aren't gonna stop them
lovely pick-up, is that the shot of the day? Hung back, and the fuller ball was there to drive on the up. Leans into it on the front foot, and lofts over mid-on. Don't bother running
eased to third man
flatbatted that short delivery down the ground. Mid-off  cuts it off. That was fast from Wahab
yorker length, dug out by Pandya and the strike is turned over
straighter and Kohli can only guide it back to Wahab. Excellent over from Wahab so far
excellent over in the circumstances. Short ball that Kohli works to the onside for one
slower ball, Kohli turns the strike over to Pandya. Can he pick up the pace now?
what was that? A slower ball from Hasan that beat Pandya all ends up. It takes his top edge and flies through over the keeper, all the way!
deceived again by the slower ball, beaten completely. Excellent stuff from Hasan. He has been a little unlucky today on a number of occasions
and just as I say that, he sends down absolute filth. Rubbish line, way down legside, and a full toss. You don't need to be Pandya to whip that to fine leg for four, but that;s what he did
and he's back to the good stuff from Hasan. Tight line, and it's too close for the cut that Pandya's attempting. 11 off the over but it hasn't been too bad from the poor bowler
slower ball, guided down to cow corner from Pandya. The pair run two once more. 13 from that over, which rather neatly encapsulates how unlucky Hasan has been there
slower ball to start off, Kohli flicks it and absolutely dashes back for two. The throw is a little too inaccurate, and that gives the Indian captain his second consecutive half century
slapped own the ground, and beats the man at mid-off. The time to be cautious against Amir is over, it would appear
slow and wide, Kohli went reaching for it and they take one
pulverised by Pandya! Slower ball, and the batsman steps into position and absolutely bludgeons this through cover. No chance for any of the fielders, and this is dangerous for Pakistan now

and gone! Stunned silence from three fourths of the crowd. Helicopter shot from Pandya again, and it found the middle of his bat, but just didn't quite have the power to clear Babar Azam at long-on. Massive breakthrough for Pakistan
slower ball and Kohli keeps the strike. He moves to 10,999 runs in ODI cricket
driven to extra cover, rare dot ball for Pakistan
and Hasan misses his line again. Down legside, and all the batsman has to do is tickle it to fine leg. Gets to 11,000 runs, and the quickest to do so by far. By 54 innings, to be precise
another ball that's tossed down legside. There was swing there, but down the wrong line, it's useless. Another easy flick to the fine leg boundary
slow waist height delivery, Kohli smacks it to midwicket, where a diving Imam prevents another four
tap and run. Risk-free 11 runs off the over already, with a ball to go
extra bounce, a thick outside edge to third man
Dhoni is gone, Amir strikes! The former Indian captain looked to heave at one that was full and wide, and another thick edge goes through to Sarfaraz
good delivery to Shankar first up. Pace and wide from Amir. Pakistan will try and keep him on strike
slower ball, and Shankar dabs it to third man. Good result for India
doesn't quite time this, but gives him the opportunity to power through for another two. He has not once been denied by the Pakistan fielders once he's made his mind up.
easy single to the onside. Four off the over and a wicket so far
good fielding at point. It has begun to drizzle.
spooned over point, there was a bit of excitement from the fielder, but no chance in truth
straight and quick, and driven to the fielder
worked away to the onside, and they come back for two

and he's gone, is he? Full and wide, and Shankar edges it to Sarfaraz. A big appeal, and the umpire rules it out. Reviewed immediately. The review shows a clear gap between bat and ball. Decision overturned
scooped up into the covers, and Shankar gets Kohli on strike for the final ball of the 47th
given a wide. Slower bouncer, and the umpire thinks it's above Kohli's head
so delicately done! Kohli uses the pace of the ball and guides it between the keeper and third man. Slower ball, but it still trickles all the way for four
slower ball, Shankar swings and hits fresh air. Pakistan need to keep him at this end
worked away to long-on. No thoughts of two, as Kohli wants to remain on strike
square cuts the slower ball, and it requires sharp work at deep extra to cut it off
gone, is he? Pakistan have Kohli! Quick bouncer, too quick for Kohli, who tried to swivel and pull it to fine leg. Gets the faintest of edges, and a prolonged appeal moves the umpire's finger
rolls his fingers over it, and Jadhav can only find point
Sensational over from Amir. Four off the over and the wicket of Virat Kohli. Pakistan finishing with a bit of momentum
that's Wahab at his worst. Wide and wild, Sarfaraz does well to keep it from going for five wides. Needs to keep it tight
helped to third man
no control from Shankar, scooped into the covers
another wide, Wahab is losing his discipline slightly. Nowhere near the stumps
Jadhav gets away the boundary, much needed for India! It was in the slot and he hit it through the line and just about clears mid-off
too quick for Jadhav, 89mph. Raps him on the gloves
short ball, in the air, kept deep square interested. The fielder plays it safe though and opts to field it on the bounce rather than go for the catch
low full toss, driven into the covers. Wahab's final over costs 12
dropped! Too difficult, in truth, and Amir got two hands to it, but didn't quite stick
slower ball. Amir gets the outside edge from Jadhav, but doesn't quite carry to Sarfaraz. Amir is running rings around India at the moment
in the block hole, excellent death bowling. Full, and driven to mid-off, and India scamper one
and here's one for you Shankar haters! Lovely drive over extra cover. He read what Amir would do and leaned into that shot. Flew over extra cover and nearly carried all the way for six
he's gone too wide there
driven to long-on
no timing but slogged to cover, and sharp work on the boundary prevents two
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away to fine leg and Pakistan are away
short of length delivery angling away, Fakhar lets this go. There's some zip off the surface for Bhuvi this time.
nice and full, gets this to swerve away a little from off stump, defended from the crease
tucks this down to fine leg
pushes back to a full delivery, defended into the covers
beauty! Nips away ever-so-slightly to beat his waft outside off. Superb from Bhuvi
length, on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
full on the pads, the backlift is so high that by the time it comes down for the flick, the ball already thuds into the pads. This was a half-volley that should've been put away.
full toss and spanked through the covers! No one moved.
beaten as he tries to flay this square of the wicket. Zipped off the deck at 140kph
excellent leave. Nibbles away just a touch as Bumrah slants this across
defends this full delivery on middle and leg to square leg.
defended off the backfoot to the cover fielder
slips this down leg, zips through to Dhoni. Wide called and rightly so
slash and a miss! Bowled at 144kph, would you believe it? This is much fuller, not there for the cut that Imam attempts.
pacy again, looks to tuck it to the leg side but is hit high on the thigh pad
gets half-forward as he pushes this towards mid-off
balance and timing is impeccable as he flicks this from length on middle. Bisects the gap between midwicket and mid-on. Stunning from Imam
whips this down to fine leg
hustled for pace as he hops back to defend, gets an inside edge onto the pad
right behind the line as he defends this length ball
punched confidently to mid-off
pushed deep into his crease as he gets on top of the bounce and taps it, they also scamper a quick single

this is a corker of a delivery! Nipped away off the seam to beat Fakhar's leading edge. He was looking to clip this square, closed the bat face. Not sure how that missed the edge. Kohli has a wry smile
slants a full delivery across, left alone
beaten by late movement. Looks to punch on the up away from the body
this is magical from Bhuvneshwar! Absolute skill. Imam is squared up as he hops back to defend. Opened up by the pace and bounce
pushes this to mid-on
plays inside the line from the crease, whizzes past the outside edge. Tentative from Imam, not too sure he knows which way the ball's going to move.

huge appeal and he's struck first ball with a nip-backer! Vijay is delighted as are the rest of his mates. Imam is walking off. Massive break for India from an unlikely source. This is bowled full, swung back in a hint, but the doubt remains. Did it pitch outside leg? Could Pakistan have reviewed? Will need a replay to confirm everything, but what is confirmed is Pakistan have lost their first wicket.
oooohs and aaaahs, pushes outside the line to get an inside edge onto the pad, they scamper through for a single.
slants in a length ball on middle, defended from the crease
dabs this down to third man
looks to belt this through point but is cramped for room, chopped to the off side
late on the defensive shot, gets an inside edge onto the pad, rolls to the off side and they complete a single
is right back inside the crease as he keeps out this length ball on the stumps
width and he's crashed this in front of square. Delightfully punched.
slips this down leg and this has been helped on it way. Easy pickings.
slapped away but a misfield at covers keeps it down to a single. Lucky to get away with that filth of a delivery
gets this to lift off the deck from a length, defended gently into the off side
superb stop by Kohli at extra cover. This was a half-volley which he absolutely belted, but the skipper threw himself to his left, full-length to stop it even as he was airborne
goes full outside off, Babar drives but gets a thick inside edge that rolls to mid-on
driven firmly but straight to mid-off
short of length delivery angled across, defended back
this is a beauty! Fakhar had no clue as he hung his bat out to defend. No feet movement, indecisive. Played from the crease
defended from the crease
looks to pull but he's beaten for pace. Excellent from Bumrah, attacked him on middle and leg
gloves this pull, rolls to square leg.
short, down leg and he's helped this along to the fine leg boundary.
angles in a length ball on off stump, defended back
mistimes this attempted cut to cover
scorching drive from Babar, can pay to watch strokes like that! Overpitched and he put it away without much fuss. Through extra cover
defended with soft hands, rolls behind the stumps
mistimes a drive to mid-on, got it off the inside edge. Quick single
hit on the pad, but this pitched outside leg. Looked to mow it across the line
draws the edge, down to third man. Bowled this nice and full outside off
squeezes the drive to cover point
mistimes this slog to mid-on, just about manages to complete the single
attacks the stumps with a full delivery from wide of the crease, defended
nips away off the deck from length on middle, hits him on the right pad. Rather high.
slips this way down leg
driven on the up to mid-off for an easy single
full, and Babar drives to deep cover, where India have unsurprisingly put a man now
no timing, thick inside edge to the onside
extra yard of pace, and Fakhar but about manages to get the middle of the bat on the pull shot
tight line, defended by Babar
short and wide. Babar cuts, but only to the deep fielder
exceptionally tight, Pakistan are being suffocated here. Asking rate continues to rocket
full, Babar tries to guide to third man but point cuts it off
wider half-volley, Babar strokes it elegantly, but only for one down to cover
in the slot. Fakhar looks to tee off but sharp fielding at extra cover cuts off any avenue for runscoring
sliced to deep extra cover
in the slot once more, but Babar doesn't quite get it wide enough of the deep cover man to get four. They come back for two

finds the boundary the other side of that fielder! Shorter and tighter to the body, but Babar caresses it past point, and no chance for the man in the deep. Much, much, much needed boundary for his team
starts off a little short, dive at short third saves any runs
no timing, trickles to the off side
better ball, Kuldeep can bowl a deviously probing line. Almost through Fakhar's defences
takes a thick outside edge, rolls through to the man at 45
cut away to the offside, first run of the over with a ball to go
helped around to fine leg. Just two of Kuldeep's first over. Brings up Pakistan's 50
straight, blocked
full, worked away to the onside
slower bouncer, and Fakhar had to adjust a bit there. Initially looked like he wanted to dispatch it to cow corner, but managed to guide it past fine leg, where it trickles through for four
struck to mid-off, and Babar has the strike now
gets a thick outside edge and the ball runs down to third man. Some seam movement for Pandya in this over
short and wide. Close to actually being a wide, but not quite
driven down the ground
stump-to-stump line, struck back to the bowler
full and slightly wide, and the batsman turns the strike over to deep cover
tap and run. Good single from Babar. They'll need to be sharp with their running today
an attempted heave from Fakhar, nearly dragged it on instead.
this is more cultured from Fakhar. Steps away, makes some room and cuts past short third man, who has a chase on his hands. Prevents the boundary, but the over ends up going for six
turned around to square leg
that might have been trouble. Babar took on mid-on, who might have had the batsman struggling had he not misfielded
disdainfully dispatched by Fakhar! That's more like the player Pakistan need him to be. Premeditated, length picked up and a baseball swing to cow corner.
comes around the wicket and targets the stumps. Ties him up nicely, and Fakhar can only block
runs it to third man and races down to the boundary for four. Is this the over that Pakistan get a move on?
hammered away by Fakhar again, but this time to the boundary fielder
Scooped to the onside. Got the edge but lands in vacant ground
cut away but brilliant fielding at backward point saves three runs
defended on the onside
looked to run it down to fine leg again, but slaps it instead to square leg
Babar gets onto the back foot to smack the short ball, but goes to the boundary fielder instead
tickled to fine leg
flighted nicely, defended
helped into the onside
driven to long-off
run down to long-on and the strike turns over
guided to deep cover
spots the googly early, turns it around to fine leg for one
sliced away to deep extra cover
the footwork wasn't quite up to it, and safely tapped to third man
wider down the legside into Fakhar's pads
stroked to long-off. India are beginning to turn the screws again
lovely bowling, was that pad first? Kohli really wanted to review, but Dhoni gives him short shrift. Was sure there was nothing in it, Dhoni
short ball, no timing on the pull. Just two off that over
flight and turn, Fakhar blocks

sharp turn, and has Fakhar's foot dragged out of his crease? Umpire goes upstairs. It's exceptionally tight, but looks like the batsman just about dragged his foot back in the nick of time. The third umpire goes with not out
Fakhar drives to long-off, and happily gets down the other end
blocked. Pakistan are beginning to lose momentum now
googly, Babar tries to turn it to fine leg
tucked away to the onside, just one from the over. For the next ten, enjoy Shashank's company

what a welcome! Into my comms stint, I mean. Sees this tossed up and he gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps with the spin to clear deep midwicket. Vijay and KL Rahul were in with a shout for a brief while.
uppish but just short of Kohli. Chipped, didn't go through with it. The ball dipped on Fakhar as he played the stroke
flatter one on middle and leg, swept fiercely to deep square leg
looks to ease it with the spin, not much room to work with, rolls back towards the bowler.
doesn't quite get to the pitch, defended back
misfield by Jadhav at midwicket and Pakistan have a single that shouldn't have been
rocks back and cuts to point
works this against the turn towards fine leg, the man had to come around a long way, by which time they hared back for the second
swept with the spin to deep backward square leg

biffed into the gap at deep midwicket. Picked this slog sweep towards the long boundary. Two bounces to the rope. This was full and flat, he picked it superbly. Pakistan are revving up slowly but surely. Will need Fakhar to convert this half-century into a century
defended back to the bowler again
squeezes the drive past the diving Kohli at cover for a single
eased against the turn to long-off
swept against the turn, picked it off a length. What clean connection. Magnificent from Babar. Decided to go through with the stroke and he's picked the bones out of that.
works this against the turn to long-on
swept, but didn't get control, rolls off the inside edge to Rahul at deep square
gentle tap into the off side, they scamper through
makes room to cut, Chahal sees that and cramps him for room, defended
swept all along the ground to fine leg
drifts in and spins away off a length on middle, bunts it with soft hands to the off side
turns this googly to midwicket, got as close as possible to the pitch to negate the turn
nudges this to short fine, risky single taken as DK fires a throw from short fine.
cut away with the spin to sweeper cover

through the gate! Incredible delivery from a supremely talented bowler. Everything about this delivery is the kind of stuff dreams are made of for a left-arm wristspinner. Nicely tossed up, the ball drifts away gently across Babar, pitches and then wickedly spins back in. Babar is looking to get outside the line to block, but is completely deceived by the dip, and then because he's played down the wrong line with a bit of gap between bat and pad, there's no second line of defence. Babar was worried about the wrong'un. Sneaks through the gap, clean bowled. Wow, what a ball. Magnificent.
defended into the off side with soft hands
taps to point, wants a single but is sent back. The throw is wide at the striker's end and they get an over-throw. Vijay is livid with himself. Needed a better throw.
sharp turn back in, gets a thickish inside edge to square leg
works this with the spin to midwicket
wrong'un wich he picks and taps to the off side for a single
he's clobbered this sweep 15 rows back at deep midwicket. Not quite the length for the stroke but he took him on bravely and let his timing do the rest.
sharp turn off a length, beaten on a forward push

he's top-edged this sweep to short fine. What a tame end to a promising innings. This was tossed up, he was sweeping against the turn, didn't get on top of the bounce and ended up giving a dolly to Chahal. Back-to-back wickets for Kuldeep. This is quickly slipping away from Pakistan.
looking to sweep, then tries to squeeze a drive, in the end gets into a tangle, squirts this back into his pad
toe-ends a sweep to Kohli at short midwicket
wrong'un on a length, defended back
lunges forward and defends back, excellent stop off his own bowling.
driven through the line to sweeper cover
shows the full face of the bat to drive to mid-off
hops back and defends to the man coming in from point
slips this slower bouncer down leg, Hafeez wanted to pull but let it go in the end
hops back and punches to point
he's picked out the lone man at deep square. Oh, dear. What have you done, Hafeez? Elegantly flicked but timed it a bit too well. Pandya's turn to make a splash. How this game has turned.

oh, it's a golden duck! The extra bounce from Hardik does the trick. Effort ball, got this to bounce off a length, just around off, Malik with a feeble push from the crease and ends up chopping on. Didn't ride the bounce, was perhaps surprised by it too. If that's the last we've seen of Malik in this World Cup, it'll be a bit sad. But he's now got two ducks in a row.
lunges forward and defends
eases this wrong'un back to the bowler
works this into the gap at square leg to get off the mark
gets outside the line of the stumps and blocks
slaps this to sweeper cover
whips this to deep midwicket
angles in a full ball from wide of the crease, squirted back
ripper of a short ball, Sarfraz takes a couple of steps out and then fends. Hit him on the shoulder and lobbed up.
pushes this incoming length ball to midwicket
tucks this into the gap at square leg
right behind the line as he defends back this length delivery
pulled behind square, neatly played even though this was in the air. Races away. Welcome boundary
breaks back in from a length outside off, defended back
eases this googly to long-off
rocks back and cuts to deep cover. Jadeja with the mopping up
skids one through on a length, squirted back
gets well forward and smothers this
worked with the spin to deep midwicket
guided down to square leg for a run
width, and Imad slashes it away to the offside
shorter this time, pulled down to fine leg
slower bouncer. Imad works it down to square leg
punched through the offside. Five singles in a row
bouncer, helped to fine leg. Six off the over, and the asking rate climbs above 10
tucked away to the onside for a single
turned around to midwicket. They think about two but it's India, not Pakistan in the field. So they decide against it
jabbed to point
an overthrow allows the pair to steal a single
bouncer, Sarfaraz rises to greet the bounce and tickles it away to third man. The pair are rotating the strike well, but the time for that is perhaps long past
excellent shot. Almost head height, that bouncer but Imad kept it down and carved it to cow corner, where it scoots along to the boundary
Safaraz tries to open up the offside, but strikes it straight to point. Looks like they still ant to attack Shankar
tight line, wicket-to-wicket, driven right back to the bowler
finds the fielder again. India's dominance over every aspect of this match is something to behold
dragged it down to the onside
full and sliced to point. Jadeja stationed there puts in a dive and saves a few runs
Sarfaraz finally gets off the strike with a straight drive
gets it away to square leg. Just three from that over
good-looking straight drive
biffed straight down the ground. Nearly takes the umpire with him. Most importantly, gets a boundary for Pakistan. They need several more
worked to the onside
dragged down legside, a muffled appeal, but never really anything in it
low full toss and Imad takes mid-off on with a quick single
guided down to third man. Eight off that over

and gone! The Pakistan captain drags on. Looked to drive expansively through the offside. gets an inside edge instead, and the ball clatters into leg stump. Another nail in an already tightly secured Pakistan coffin
drives on the full
off the mark with a drive off a half-volley
short of a length and the extra bounce does Imad
drives straight back to Shankar
straight to point
drilled to wide long-off
drifts this wrong'un way outside the wide line
cuts to deep point, Rahul with the mopping up
nice flight, lands this on off, dips on Shadab who squeezes this wide of point
through with the pull even before the ball arrived, this was another googly.
toe-ends this slog to long-on, fetched it from way outside off
slices the drive up and over the infield, but only just.
yorker-length on middle, squeezed to long-on
mistimes this wild slog to long-on
dipping slower delivery, squeezed to square leg
slashed up and over point, Chahal sprints around from third man to cut that off
makes room and punches this short of length delivery to cover
smashed back, mid-off didn't even try to stop. Picked the bones out of it
slips this too far wide outside off, googly gone wrong.
muscled over mid-off, bounces away from the boundary rider. Hit really hard, skidded off the turf as it pitched on the wet outfield.
mistimes this hoick to wide long-on
toe-ends this slog to midwicket
Rahul has put down a simple chance at deep midwicket. Shadab's slog across the line resulted in a top-edge, was in the air for a long long time. He just took it way too casually.
mistimes a lofted hit but it lands in no man's land, between cover and wide long-off
punched down to long-on, lazy work in the deep by Kuldeep. They take two more
belted down the ground! Backed away, got underneath the length and gave it a proper whack.
slash and a miss
lofted down to deep cover
eased down to deep cover
the bouncer is too good for Imad as he backs away to pull, beaten for pace. Dhoni fumbled and this one nearly grazed the helmet behind him.
upper cut, helped on its way. Bumrah bowls a no-ball says the umpire, frontfoot was okay. Poor call Free-hit coming up
squeezes the drive to mid-off
walks across to scoop, misses.
slower length ball, crashed to sweeper cover
slower delivery, dips on Shadab as he backs away and squeezes to long-off
pulled to long-on, Jadeja with a jolly throw
steered behind point
looks to walk across and scoop, misses it by a long way. Emphatic win for India.
